messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in IPA Edition 3's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Or it could be ionossspheric disssturbance, AI pleassse check the telecommsss room for damagesss.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Miners, the mime blinded themselves and now need new technological eyes, this requires resources and research

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in IPA Edition 3's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in IPA Edition 3's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.
